main: ^So what is the trick to making a good bunny chow aunty?
^To make a proper Bunny Chow, you'll need some delicious Durban curry, a hollowed-out loaf of bread, and plenty of love.
^The trick is in the spices, how. We love our spices! But don’t worry about looking for the spices, I have it here for you in a bag. Come get more if you need.
